meanings.definition: A line of stitching applied to the top of a garment for decorative or reinforcing purposes.
meanings.sent1: The dress had beautiful topstitches along the neckline.
meanings.sent2: She carefully added topstitches to the hem of the skirt.
meanings.sent3: The topstitches on the jacket were like tiny soldiers standing guard.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like topstitches, holding the family together.
meanings.sent5: The topstitches sparkled like stars in the night sky.

meanings.definition: To sew a line of stitching on the top of a garment.
meanings.sent1: She topstitches the edges of the fabric to prevent fraying.
meanings.sent2: I will topstitch the pockets to make them more secure.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally topstitches his sleeve to his shirt.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter seemed to topstitch their hearts closer together.
meanings.sent5: The music topstitches memories into our minds.

meanings.definition: The act of sewing a line of stitching on the top of a garment.
meanings.sent1: Her topstitches were always neat and precise.
meanings.sent2: The topstitches on the pillow added a nice touch.
meanings.sent3: The cat's playful antics interrupted her topstitches.
meanings.sent4: His kindness acted as topstitches in their friendship.
meanings.sent5: The topstitches held the fabric together like a gentle hug.
